hypothesis_content.title: Stress Regime Entry via Correlation Spike & Volume Divergence
hypothesis_content.statement: When 30-day rolling correlation between BTC and S&P 500 exceeds 0.65 (unusual coupling) while BTC volume decreases >20% relative to 30-day average but price volatility increases (10-day HV > 50%), this signals impending STRESS regime within 2-3 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: High correlation with traditional markets during low volume suggests crypto is being dragged by macro forces. Volatility increase on low volume indicates fragile liquidity. Current regulatory developments (MiCA, UK) increase sensitivity to traditional market stress. Flattening term structure shows hedging demand.
entry_conditions: Fear & Greed Index drops >15 points in 2 days

exit_conditions.take_profit: Correlation drops below 0.4 OR VIX drops >8 points
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Correlation sustains >0.7 for 5+ days without stress event

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: High correlation periods resolve without volatility expansion (>60% of cases) OR volume recovers before stress materializes.
